post.body: I've noticed ur sponsoring many UFC fighters, how'd u decide this was a good fit 4 the brand? How do u choose the fighters? Results?

Hope you guys win. I absolutely love the product!!
a search engine mktg seminar. Was worried it would just be a sales pitch, but it's actually not bad.

Was a good game. Nice 2 c replay in action. I think we'll c these 2 battle in the playoffs.

I really and truly hate Comics.com's website redesign.Tons of glitches, everything is now hard to find. I need a new comic site.
I hate when shopping people who block entire aisleways especially when it seems like you keep running in to them all over the store.
I really hate comics.com's new web redesign. It seems like every day they make it more and more user unfriendly. Pout.
I am constantly amazed at how many companies still don't get email/internet marketing. They don't seem to even get the basic concepts.

Anyone know any good tips for dealing with perfume allergies? I'm getting so tired of taking Excedrin almost every day to try and deal.
